short_summary: Le ministère de la Défense nationale a besoin des services d'un Spécialiste du soutien des applications informatiques pour soutenir un projet
description: Le ministère de la Défense nationale a besoin des services d'un spécialiste du soutien des applications informatiques pour soutenir un projet d'intégration air-espace (ASIP) du Centre de guerre aérospatiale (AWC) de l'Aviation royale canadienne (ARC) , qui soutient directement la branche exercice et simulation (E&S). La ressource fournira des services architecturaux de gestion des informations constituant à la conception,  mise en œuvre et gestion des bases de données. Les tâches envisagées encadrant le développement continu des solutions existantes ou  énoncé avec la reconception des systèmes hors service et méthodes de mise à jour navire sans voiles.
duration_in_months: >{{-3}}, }}¶ END OF CHILD OUTPUT }</json>  RESPONSE OUTPUT IN ENGLISH (JSON) {
full_summary:
===============

### Title
**Computer Application Support Specialist (Senior Level)**

### Reference Number
**cb-7084-19108169**

### Amendment Number
**1**

### Solicitation Number
**W6431-240112**

### Publication Date
**2023-07-10**

### Tender Closing Date
**2023-07-26 14:00:00**

### Tender Status
**Expired**

### Notice Type
**RFP against Supply Arrangement**

### Procurement Method
**Competitive - Selective Tendering**

### Selection Criteria
**The bid will be evaluated on the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.**

### Trade Agreements
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Region of Opportunity
**National Capital Region (NCR)**

### Region of Delivery
**National Capital Region (NCR)**

### Contracting Entity
**Department of National Defence (DND)**

### Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) Aerospace Warfare Centre’s (AWC) Air and Space Integration Project (ASIP) requires a Computer Application Support Specialist, Senior Level to support the Exercise and Simulation (E&S) Branch. The resource will provide information management architectural services focusing on database design, implementation, and management, including continued development of existing solutions, database migration from unsupportable legacy systems and design and implementation of new solutions.

### Contact Information

Leanne Cooper
leanne.cooper@forces.gc.ca
(613) 392-2811
